name: You Solve My Puzzle
description:
Games Members You Solve My Puzzle **Award for Best Design** - Athens Game Jam 2016 - This is a 2 player puzzle game that requires close co-operation and constant communication in order to solve.
- Requires separate computers.
- Please use headphones. Some of the puzzles are audio puzzles and you need to be able to hear them.
- Don't look at each others screens. It is best played facing each other - like the game Battle Ship.

- This is an experimental game - The only networking between the computers is your voice. This game is designed to force 2 people to communicate. If you find yourself getting mad at your teammate, see if you can figure out where you're failing to communicate!

- We love hearing feedback! Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/bluehatstudios

Designed and created by: Aaron Wilson & Zach Smith
